page.title: 20HOUNSLOW CIVIC CENTRE
page.content: The Civic Centre was opened in 1976.It is a modern red brick building surrounded by landscape gardens and set in{Lampton Park.}The Centre is arranged on 2 main levels and also has a basement with staff recreational facilities.It is open-plan in design with low screens dividing different areas.There are{13 council departments dealing with such matters as Education Social Services,housing etc.and they are all{administered}by the{Chief {Executives Office.Council meetings}are held every 6 weeks in the{Council {Chamber}60 councillors being elected every 4 years.The centre is used by the public and the{Lampton Suite}can be hired for dances,dinners and conferences.The Civic Centre is a busy place having approximately 1,235 staff working in it and receiving about 5,000 telephone calls a day.
